title: 2 things, Rito pls
body:
so the first thing is that the support section by zendesk is busted, it comes up with and error whenever I try to sign in it says Invalid JWT Request

JWT requests must be sent to https://riotgames.zendesk.com/access/jwt. and the other thing is that I've calculated out the RP after my most recent purchases and it'd be super awesome if I could get 34 rp that way I can get all the skins I want when snowdown comes, let me know what you guys think!

replies.body:
Hey Androgar,

Could you copy-paste the link in your address bar when you attempt to log in and receive this error? This will help me investigate this further. Thanks!
Actually, I'm not getting this anymore. Only got it with Edge, works fine now.
This happens particularly with Microsoft Edge.
